article_title: Blue Cross Blue Shield pays $1 million to settle Montana complaints

article_metadata.news_keywords: , blue cross blue shield of montana, monica lindeen

og.description: Montana Commissioner of Securities and Insurance Monica Lindeen announced Thursday a $1 million settlement related to hundreds of customer complaints against Blue Cross Blue Shield of Montana.
